text: Thanks! There are a bunch of colours defined by themes (<https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/theme-color>), but I haven't found one I was happy with for all themes. Worst case we could just add an opacity setting (or even a colour picker/text box) to configure this. Hasn't been a particularly high priority though.

attachments.title: Theme Color
attachments.text: Theme Color reference that lists all themable colors in Visual Studio Code.
